testAssertionSignature

public void testAssertionSignature()
                            throws MarshallingException,
                                   ValidationException,
                                   SignatureException,
                                   UnmarshallingException,
                                   SecurityException
Creates a simple Assertion, signs it and then verifies the signature.

Throws:
MarshallingException - thrown if the Assertion can not be marshalled into a DOM
ValidationException - thrown if the Signature does not validate
SignatureException
UnmarshallingException
SecurityException
